package sample;

public class Test {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int I,C,T,B,D;
		B=25000;
		D=15000;
		T=11000;
	    C=B+D;
	    System.out.println(C);
        C=C-T;
        System.out.println(C);
        I=C*2/100;
        System.out.println(I);
        C=I*12+C;
        System.out.println(C);
	}

}
